Your wellness newsletter for the month of February 
If you are having trouble viewing this email view online <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/gasZCjOo4FymoVLhRhBTm2H9K?domain=app2.comms.cigna.com> 	  	  <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bb0866b45-7b1a-4c0e-a929-c9cd7c591ed5%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_pos_rgb.png> 
 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B3303256f-b00c-4698-a011-beae8a8acb3a%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_rev_rgb.png> 
 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B95ccdb01-1ed3-4cef-9b7c-9cb1bc0f9a46%7D_Q2_Visionscreening.jpg> 	

Middle East & Africa wellness newsletter 


February 2025 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bc126220d-91e1-40d2-b6cb-df0b6286d51c%7D_2023-brand-leaf.png> 	

Did you know that at least 2.2 billion people have some sort of vision impairment? 

When you can't see as well, daily life may feel more challenging. However, the good news is that a majority of individuals suffering from poor vision can easily be treated if they are diagnosed in time.
